Html.content: In this approach you add language-specific sub-sites or sub-folders right below the root folder of your site. It's good practice to name these folders after theÂ ISO 639-1 language codes, e.g. en or de. For each of these "lanuage-folders" you set the property locale to the locale of the sub site they contain. So, typically to the name of the folder, e.g., for the folder en you set the property locale to en.
